scripts.stop: npm run stop:server && npm run stop:client
scripts.start: npm stop && npm run start:server && npm run start:client
scripts.stop:server: ps aux | grep -e 'nodemon\| 3331' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
scripts.stop:client: ps aux | grep 'ng serve' | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
